original_text: The sins of some are obvious, reaching the place of judgment ahead of them; the sins of others trail behind them.
korean_text: 어떤 사람들의 죄는 밝히 드러나 먼저 심판에 나아가고 어떤 사람들의 죄는 그 뒤를 따르나니

sentences.original_text: The sins of some are obvious
reaching the place of judgment ahead of them
the sins of others trail behind them
sentences.korean_translation: 다른 사람들의 죄는 그들 뒤를 따른다
